abstract: Blackstone Group, the private equity firm and deal adviser, has brought in a former media banker from JPMorgan Chase as it anticipates more upheaval in the media industry.
snippet: Blackstone Group, the private equity firm and deal adviser, has brought in a former media banker from JPMorgan Chase as it anticipates more upheaval in the media industry.
lead_paragraph: Blackstone Group, the private equity firm and deal adviser, has brought in a former media banker from JPMorgan Chase as it anticipates more upheaval in the media industry.

headline.main: Blackstone Hires Head of Media Advisory Group
